sqlMap.select:
select ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_YEAR, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ARR_DATE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_BASE_GGYQ, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ATTACH, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ATTACH_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PINMU_CTLG, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_NEW_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CAIG_NUM, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_ITEM_SUM, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MER_PRICE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.BUDGET_BI_MONEY, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, B.ZC_BRA_CODE,B.ZC_BRA_NAME, M.ZC_MER_CODE,M.ZC_MER_NAME, S.ZC_SU_CODE,S.ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_SU_JIN_JIA,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_CHENG_JIAO, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_JIN_JIA_SUBMIT_DATE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_GONG_HUO,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_NO_GONG_HUO_REASON,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.zc_caig_unit from ZC_P_PRO_MITEM ,ZC_ZB_PINP B,ZC_B_MERCHANDISE M,ZC_B_SUPPLIER S
AND ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_BRA_CODE=B.ZC_BRA_CODE(+) AND ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MER_CODE=M.ZC_MER_CODE(+) AND ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_SU_CODE=S.ZC_SU_CODE(+)
order by ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_ITEM_SUM,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_JIN_JIA_SUBMIT_DATE,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_CODE asc

select ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_YEAR, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ARR_DATE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_BASE_GGYQ, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ATTACH, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ATTACH_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PINMU_CTLG, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_NEW_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CAIG_NUM, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_ITEM_SUM, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MER_PRICE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.BUDGET_BI_MONEY, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, B.ZC_BRA_CODE,B.ZC_BRA_NAME, M.ZC_MER_CODE,M.ZC_MER_NAME, S.ZC_SU_CODE,S.ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_SU_JIN_JIA,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_CHENG_JIAO, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_JIN_JIA_SUBMIT_DATE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_GONG_HUO,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_NO_GONG_HUO_REASON,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.zc_caig_unit from ZC_P_PRO_MITEM ,ZC_ZB_PINP B,ZC_B_MERCHANDISE M,ZC_B_SUPPLIER S
where ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_BRA_CODE=B.ZC_BRA_CODE(+) AND ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MER_CODE=M.ZC_MER_CODE(+) AND ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_SU_CODE=S.ZC_SU_CODE(+)
ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcText0:VARCHAR#
ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_BRA_CODE IN (select distinct zc_b_merchandise.zc_bra_code from zc_b_merchandise, zc_b_mer_discount where zc_b_merchandise.zc_mer_code = zc_b_mer_discount.zc_mer_code and zc_b_mer_discount.zc_su_code=#zcText1:VARCHAR#)
order by ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_CODE asc

select ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_YEAR, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ARR_DATE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_BASE_GGYQ, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ATTACH, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ATTACH_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PINMU_CTLG, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_NEW_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CAIG_NUM, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_ITEM_SUM, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MER_PRICE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.BUDGET_BI_MONEY, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, B.ZC_BRA_CODE,B.ZC_BRA_NAME, M.ZC_MER_CODE,M.ZC_MER_NAME, S.ZC_SU_CODE,S.ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_SU_JIN_JIA,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_CHENG_JIAO, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_JIN_JIA_SUBMIT_DATE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_GONG_HUO,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_NO_GONG_HUO_REASON,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.zc_caig_unit from ZC_P_PRO_MITEM ,ZC_ZB_PINP B,ZC_B_MERCHANDISE M,ZC_B_SUPPLIER S where ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR# and ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_CODE = #zcPitemCode:DECIMAL# AND ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_BRA_CODE=B.ZC_BRA_CODE(+) AND ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MER_CODE=M.ZC_MER_CODE(+) AND ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_SU_CODE=S.ZC_SU_CODE(+)
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_P_PRO_MITEM where ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR# and ZC_PITEM_CODE = #zcPitemCode:DECIMAL#

update ZC_P_PRO_MITEM
ZC_MAKE_CODE = #record.zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_PITEM_CODE = #record.zcPitemCode:DECIMAL#
ZC_YEAR = #record.zcYear:CHAR#
ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE = #record.zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME = #record.zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#
ZC_PITEM_NAME = #record.zcPitemName:VARCHAR#
ZC_PITEM_ARR_DATE = #record.zcPitemArrDate:TIMESTAMP#
ZC_BASE_GGYQ = #record.zcBaseGgyq:VARCHAR#
ZC_PITEM_ATTACH = #record.zcPitemAttach:VARCHAR#
ZC_PITEM_ATTACH_BLOBID = #record.zcPitemAttachBlobid:VARCHAR#
ZC_PINMU_CTLG = #record.zcPinmuCtlg:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_NEW_CODE = #record.zcMakeNewCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_CAIG_NUM = #record.zcCaigNum:DECIMAL#
ZC_ITEM_SUM = #record.zcItemSum:DECIMAL#
ZC_MER_PRICE = #record.zcMerPrice:DECIMAL#
BUDGET_BI_MONEY = #record.budgetBiMoney:DECIMAL#
BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY = #record.budgetOtherMoney:DECIMAL#

update ZC_P_PRO_MITEM set ZC_MAKE_CODE = #record.zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_CODE = #record.zcPitemCode:DECIMAL#, ZC_YEAR = #record.zcYear:CHAR#, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE = #record.zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME = #record.zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_NAME = #record.zcPitemName:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_ARR_DATE = #record.zcPitemArrDate:TIMESTAMP#, ZC_BASE_GGYQ = #record.zcBaseGgyq:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_ATTACH = #record.zcPitemAttach:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_ATTACH_BLOBID = #record.zcPitemAttachBlobid:VARCHAR#, ZC_PINMU_CTLG = #record.zcPinmuCtlg:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_NEW_CODE = #record.zcMakeNewCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_CAIG_NUM = #record.zcCaigNum:DECIMAL#, ZC_ITEM_SUM = #record.zcItemSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_MER_PRICE = #record.zcMerPrice:DECIMAL#, BUDGET_BI_MONEY = #record.budgetBiMoney:DECIMAL#, BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY = #record.budgetOtherMoney:DECIMAL#

update ZC_P_PRO_MITEM
ZC_YEAR = #zcYear:CHAR#
ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE = #zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME = #zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#
ZC_PITEM_NAME = #zcPitemName:VARCHAR#
ZC_PITEM_ARR_DATE = #zcPitemArrDate:TIMESTAMP#
ZC_BASE_GGYQ = #zcBaseGgyq:VARCHAR#
ZC_PITEM_ATTACH = #zcPitemAttach:VARCHAR#
ZC_PITEM_ATTACH_BLOBID = #zcPitemAttachBlobid:VARCHAR#
ZC_PINMU_CTLG = #zcPinmuCtlg:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_NEW_CODE = #zcMakeNewCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_CAIG_NUM = #zcCaigNum:DECIMAL#
ZC_ITEM_SUM = #zcItemSum:DECIMAL#
ZC_MER_PRICE = #zcMerPrice:DECIMAL#
BUDGET_BI_MONEY = #budgetBiMoney:DECIMAL#
BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY = #budgetOtherMoney:DECIMAL#
where ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR# and ZC_PITEM_CODE = #zcPitemCode:DECIMAL#

update ZC_P_PRO_MITEM set ZC_YEAR = #zcYear:CHAR#, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE = #zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME = #zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_NAME = #zcPitemName:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_ARR_DATE = #zcPitemArrDate:TIMESTAMP#, ZC_BASE_GGYQ = #zcBaseGgyq:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_ATTACH = #zcPitemAttach:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_ATTACH_BLOBID = #zcPitemAttachBlobid:VARCHAR#, ZC_PINMU_CTLG = #zcPinmuCtlg:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_NEW_CODE = #zcMakeNewCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_CAIG_NUM = #zcCaigNum:DECIMAL#, ZC_ITEM_SUM = #zcItemSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_MER_PRICE = #zcMerPrice:DECIMAL#, BUDGET_BI_MONEY = #budgetBiMoney:DECIMAL#, BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY = #budgetOtherMoney:DECIMAL#, ZC_IS_SU_JIN_JIA= #zcIsSuJinJia:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_CHENG_JIAO= #zcIsChengJiao:VARCHAR#, ZC_BRA_CODE = #zcBraCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_MER_CODE= #zcMerCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_CODE= #zcSuCode:VARCHAR# where ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR# and ZC_PITEM_CODE = #zcPitemCode:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_P_PRO_MITEM where ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR# and ZC_PITEM_CODE = #zcPitemCode:DECIMAL#
delete from ZC_P_PRO_MITEM where ZC_SU_CODE = #ZC_SU_CODE# and ZC_MAKE_CODE = #ZC_MAKE_CODE#
sqlMap.select: select '' ZC_MAKE_CODE, '' ZC_PITEM_CODE, red.ZC_YEAR, red.ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, red.ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, red.name ZC_PITEM_NAME, red.arr_date ZC_PITEM_ARR_DATE, red.base_req ZC_BASE_GGYQ, red.item_attach ZC_PITEM_ATTACH, red.item_attach_blobid ZC_PITEM_ATTACH_BLOBID, '' ZC_PINMU_CTLG, '' ZC_MAKE_NEW_CODE, red.num ZC_CAIG_NUM, red.mer_price ZC_MER_PRICE, red.item_sum ZC_ITEM_SUM, 0 BUDGET_BI_MONEY, 0 BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, '' ZC_BRA_CODE, '' ZC_BRA_NAME, '' ZC_MER_CODE, '' ZC_MER_NAME, '' ZC_SU_CODE, '' ZC_SU_NAME, '' ZC_IS_SU_JIN_JIA, '' ZC_IS_CHENG_JIAO, null ZC_JIN_JIA_SUBMIT_DATE, '' ZC_IS_GONG_HUO, ''ZC_NO_GONG_HUO_REASON, '' zc_caig_unit from zc_eb_pack_req req, zc_eb_pack_req_detail red where req.detail_code = red.detail_code and req.proj_code = #proj_code# and req.pack_code = #pack_code# order by req.detail_code
sqlMap.update: update ZC_P_PRO_MITEM set ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR# where ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcTempMakeCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_YEAR, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ARR_DATE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_BASE_GGYQ, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ATTACH, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PITEM_ATTACH_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_PINMU_CTLG, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_NEW_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_CAIG_NUM, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_ITEM_SUM, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MER_PRICE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.BUDGET_BI_MONEY, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, B.ZC_BRA_CODE,B.ZC_BRA_NAME, M.ZC_MER_CODE,M.ZC_MER_NAME, S.ZC_SU_CODE,S.ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_SU_JIN_JIA,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_CHENG_JIAO, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_JIN_JIA_SUBMIT_DATE, ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_IS_GONG_HUO,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_NO_GONG_HUO_REASON,ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.zc_caig_unit from ZC_P_PRO_MITEM ,ZC_ZB_PINP B,ZC_B_MERCHANDISE M,ZC_B_SUPPLIER S where ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_BRA_CODE=B.ZC_BRA_CODE(+) AND ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MER_CODE=M.ZC_MER_CODE(+) AND ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_SU_CODE=S.ZC_SU_CODE(+) ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE in #pmAdjustCodeList[]#
